subject: Baseball
Steroids
Doping (Sports)
lead_paragraph: When Bonds tossed out the first pitch for a Giants game last week, it was an overdue return for a man treated more harshly than many others part of an era of hypocrisy.
snippet: When Bonds tossed out the first pitch for a Giants game last week, it was an overdue return for a man treated more harshly than many others part of an era of hypocrisy.
